entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
